slides.title: Standard Costing
slides.content:
# Variance Analysis

## Material Variances

```
Price: (Actual - Standard Price) x Actual Qty
Usage: (Actual - Standard Qty) x Standard Price
```

## Labor Variances

```
Rate: (Actual - Standard Rate) x Actual Hours
Efficiency: (Actual - Standard Hours) x Standard Rate
```

## Interpretation

| Variance | F or A |
|----------|--------|
| Actual < Standard | Favorable |
| Actual > Standard | Adverse |

slides.title: Accruals Concept
slides.content:
# Matching Principle

## Accruals

```
Expense incurred but not paid

Dr Expense
Cr Accrual (liability)
```

## Prepayments

```
Expense paid in advance

Dr Prepayment (asset)
Cr Expense
```

## Revenue Recognition

- Performance obligation satisfied
- Control transferred

slides.title: Depreciation
slides.content:
# IAS 16 Application

## Methods

| Method | Formula |
|--------|--------|
| Straight-line | (Cost-RV)/Life |
| Reducing balance | NBV x Rate |
| Units | Cost x (Units/Total) |

## Components

```
Significant components:
Depreciate separately
```

## Disposal

```
Proceeds - Carrying amount = Gain/Loss
```

slides.title: Provisions and Contingencies
slides.content:
# IAS 37

## Provision Recognition

| Criterion | Requirement |
|-----------|-------------|
| Present obligation | Past event |
| Probable outflow | More likely |
| Reliable estimate | Measurable |

## Contingent Liability

| Probability | Treatment |
|-------------|----------|
| Probable | Provision |
| Possible | Disclose |
| Remote | Nothing |

## Contingent Asset

- Virtually certain: Recognize
- Probable: Disclose
- Possible: Nothing

slides.title: Cash Flow Statement
slides.content:
# IAS 7

## Categories

| Activity | Examples |
|----------|----------|
| Operating | Trading |
| Investing | PPE, investments |

## Indirect Method

```
Profit before tax
+ Depreciation
+ Loss on disposal
- Increase in receivables
+ Increase in payables
= Cash from operations
```

slides.title: Incomplete Records
slides.content:
# Reconstructing Accounts

## Techniques

| Method | Use |
|--------|-----|

## Profit Calculation

```
Closing net assets
- Opening net assets
+ Drawings
- Capital introduced
= Profit
```
